original_text: If you shoot arrows at it, it will not run away. If you use a sling to throw stones at it, the stones will hurt it no more than bits of chaff. If you shoot arrows at it, it will not run away. If you use a sling to throw stones at it, the stones will hurt it no more than bits of chaff. If you shoot arrows at it, it will not run away. korean_text: 화살이라도 그것을 물리치지 못하겠고 물맷돌도 그것에게는 겨 같이 되는구나

sentences.original_text: If you shoot arrows at it
If you use a sling to throw stones at it
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그것에게 돌멩이를 던지기 위해 새끼줄을 사용하면

sentences.original_text: the stones will hurt it no more than bits of chaff
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돌들은 겨 조각보다 더 그것을 상하게 하지 않을 것이다
